title: LAPS: We're Hiring Bus Drivers - Los Alamos Reporter
text:
LAPS NEWS RELEASE
Come drive a bus for us! Los Alamos Public Schools is currently hiring bus drivers, Starting pay is $33.00 per hour, but hourly rates increase based upon experience. Check out the salary schedule for more information. Substitute bus drivers start at $30.95 per hour.
Driving a school bus for LAPS can easily fit into one’s schedule, especially someone who is retired or looking fora second job. Click here to review the job description.
We have paid training for you to obtain the required Commercial Driver’s License. Additional driving opportunities are available for athletic events and field trips.
LAPS employees are eligible for PTO, medical, dental and vision coverage, life insurance, YMCA membership and a retirement plan (NMERB). In addition, there are opportunities for continuing and advancement, and enhanced retirement funding. Substitutes are not eligible for benefits.
For more information regarding positions in Transportation, call (505) 663-2255 or go tohttp://www.laschools.net and click on Apply for Jobs.
Los Alamos Public Schools is an Equal Opportunity Employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, religion, age, marital status, sexual orientation, disability, handicap, political status, or veteran status in employment or the provision of services (LAPS policy 4070).
